sentences.sContent: The Russian tennis prodigy is well on the way to becoming the youngest world champion of all time.
sentences.sCn: 这位俄罗斯网球奇才已很有望成为历史上最年轻的世界冠军。

synos.tran: 奇迹，奇事；奇才；奇观；预兆

words.tran: 惊人的，异常的，奇妙的；巨大的

trans.tranCn: 奇迹； 奇才； 奇观
trans.tranOther: A prodigy is someone young who has a great natural ability for something such as music, mathematics, or sports
